name: Cross Up
description:
Controls(Assuming controller is Xbox):

A = Jump (On Keyboard: Space)

B = Dash (On Keyboard: Ctrl)

X = Shoot (On Keyboard: Alt)

Move = Analog Stick/Dpad (On Keyboard: ArrowKeys/WASD)

Pause = Start (On Keyboard: Return/Enter)

Mechanics: Killing enemies increases the power of your shots up to 3 and taking damage reduces it by 1. When at max power, you can dash into enemies and kill them in one hit.

Description: Sorry for the unfinished nature of this, I bungled my time management something fierce so I only got the basic mechanics and level done before the deadline. Hopefully you still get enjoyment out of this regardless. It is also a little buggy sadly.

Update: Fixed a problem with the game not stopping when paused and pause is properly mapped on keyboard
